name: Angry Apes
description:
A survival game where Angry Apes want you dead. Collecting enough ETH will give you quite an unfair advantage!

Live Game: https://lerouxrgd.github.io/angry-apes/
Code: https://github.com/lerouxrgd/angry-apes


KeyboardGamepadAttackEnter or Key1WestDash
RControl or TABEastJumpSpaceSouthMovementsArrowsStick or DPad
